Recent events (cough/sputum worsen last week [P-1,P-5,P-6]; SOB last few days [P-1,P-8]) match Gold. Some factual discrepancies on key long-term timelines asked in question, but core recent facts correct: score 3.

Generated covers: chronic cough (no time); COPD dx (partial); 1wk cough + sputum; few days SOB. Misses: 10yr/5yr specifics, baseline SOB, chills, exertional details. reasoning.faithfulness: All claims in Generated directly verifiable: chronic cough [P-1]; COPD 'couple years' [P-1]; worsening last week [P-1]; sputum details [P-6]; SOB last few days [P-1]. Citations accurate, no hallucinations or unverifiable additions, fully grounded despite selective quoting: score 5.
reasoning.relevance: Generated structures response as bullet-point timeline directly tracing illness from chronic cough through recent worsening to current SOB prompting visit, precisely matching question's requested elements without off-topic content: score 5.

summary: The Generated Answer provides a relevant and faithful timeline of recent symptom worsening but is incomplete and has discrepancies in long-term details compared to the Gold Answer.
